actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Federal Services, Post Office, and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide for special pay for psychologists in the commissioned corps of the Public Health Service.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Amends Federal law to provide for special pay for psychologists in the commissioned corps of the Public Health Service Corps. Sets forth the rates of such special pay.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to provide for special pay for psychologists in the commissioned corps of the Public Health Service.
